name: VW Notes & Files Downloader
author: VowelWeb

sections.description:
Using VW Files and Notes Downloader you get an option in admin to easily create notes with titles and attached file to it.

Just insert shortcode like [VW_NOTES_AND_FILES_DOWNLOADER]

Don’t be a stranger: For more information or additional assistance, please contact our support team at
https://www.vwthemes.com/topic/vw-notes-files-downloader/

Related Links:
* Demo Link for Notes and files downloader

Image Urls

https://www.pexels.com/photo/black-and-blue-pens-beside-red-covered-notebook-159497/

License

This plugin is free and complimentary and is governed by GPL2 License.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload vw-notes-and-files-downloader.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Place shortcode: ‘[VW_NOTES_AND_FILES_DOWNLOADER]’ without the inverted commas in your page or post for download files.
sections.faq: Easy to use plugin. Just install it and check under settings for VW Notes & Files Downloader . Just place the shortcode in any page or post and you should be done.
